DOC.brief_summary: The investigators are comparing two methods of standard treatments in distal tibial fractures. locked plating (M.I.P.O. technique) with intramedullary nailing. the investigators are hypothesizing that M.I.P.O group is superior to nailing in fractures of the distal third of the tibia.
DOC.brief_title: M.I.P.O. vs Intramedullary Nailing in Tibia Fractures
DOC.detailed_description: The kind of plates the investigators are comparing are the Locked plates form Synthes 速 using the minimally invasive technique vs the Expert Tibial Nail速 from Synthes 速
